name: create-webmcp-app
description: Create a new WebMCP app with interactive template selection

scripts.copy-templates: rm -rf templates && mkdir -p templates && cp -r ../../templates/react templates/react && cp -r ../../templates/vanilla templates/vanilla && find templates -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find templates -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find templates -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find templates -name 'tsconfig.tsbuildinfo' -delete && find templates -name 'worker-configuration.d.ts' -delete

author: WebMCP-org
